content: this is not the same as the pansies pansies pansies 1 doily from star book no 228 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pansies-pansies-pansies **size ** in puritan size 10 thread approximately 12 inches 30 5 cm in diameter in puritan star spangled size 10 metallic twist approximately 13 inches 33 cm **materials ** the pattern recommends vintage size 10 crochet cotton 1 ball each white shaded yellows shaded purples and forest green or puritan star spangled crochet cotton 1 ball each silver spangle green spangle yellow spangle and purple spangle pattern on the vintage crochet site recommends puritan mercerized crochet cotton 1 250 yd ball white 1 175 yd ball each shaded yellows shaded purples and forest green size 7 steel hook note this pattern is called pansy doily in star book #208
